scroll_list.name: avatar_list
scroll_list.tool_tip: Hold shift or control while clicking to select multiple avatars

column.name: avatar_name
column.label: Name
column.tool_tip: Hold shift or control while clicking to select multiple avatars

column.name: client
column.label: Client
column.tool_tip: Client the avatar is possibly using

column.name: distance
column.label: Dis
column.tool_tip: Distance from your avatar (red=within chat range, yellow=within shout range, green=within draw distance)

button.name: focus_btn
button.label: Zoom
button.tool_tip: Zoom in on selected avatar

button.name: prev_in_list_btn
button.label: Previous
button.tool_tip: Focus camera on previous avatar in list

button.name: next_in_list_btn
button.label: Next
button.tool_tip: Focus camera on next avatar in list

button.name: teleport_btn
button.label: TP to
button.tool_tip: Teleport to avatar's position

button.name: mark_btn
button.label: Mark
button.tool_tip: Mark/UnMark this avatar in the list

button.name: prev_marked_btn
button.label: Prev Marked
button.tool_tip: Focus camera on previous marked avatar

button.name: next_marked_btn
button.label: Next Marked
button.tool_tip: Focus camera on next marked avatar

button.name: offer_btn
button.label: Offer TP
button.tool_tip: Offer Teleport

button.name: position_btn
button.label: copy Pos
button.tool_tip: Copy Avatars Position To The Clipboard

button.name: huds_btn
button.label: AV Huds
button.tool_tip: Offer Teleport

button.name: get_key_btn
button.label: UUID
button.tool_tip: Copies The Selected Avatars UUID Key

button.name: tphist_btn
button.label: TP Hist
button.tool_tip: Opens Your Teleport History

button.name: track_btn
button.label: Track
button.tool_tip: Toggle tracking of this avatar's position

button.name: im_btn
button.label: IM
button.tool_tip: Open Instant Message session

button.name: profile_btn
button.label: Profile
button.tool_tip: Shows Information On Secected Avatar

button.name: ground_btn
button.label: TP Ground
button.tool_tip: Moves Avatar To Ground Level

button.name: texturelog_btn
button.label: Textures
button.tool_tip: Avatar Texure Logger

button.name: debug_btn
button.label: AV Textures
button.tool_tip: Opens the selected avatars Textures

button.name: export_dude_btn
button.label: AV Export
button.tool_tip: Export the selected avatar in list

button.name: anims_btn
button.label: AV Anims
button.tool_tip: Shows The Selected Avatars Animations

check_box.label: AV Texture Logger
check_box.name: radar_alerts
check_box.tool_tip: Logs avatar textures upon entering simulator and displays in chat

check_box.label: AV's entering/exiting the sim
check_box.name: alerts_sim
check_box.tool_tip: Report avatars entering or exiting the sim

check_box.label: AV's within/beyond the draw distance
check_box.name: alerts_draw
check_box.tool_tip: Report avatars getting within or beyond the draw distance

check_box.label: AV's within/beyond the shout range
check_box.name: alerts_chat
check_box.tool_tip: Report avatars getting within or beyond the shout range

check_box.label: AV's within/beyond the chat range
check_box.name: alerts_chat
check_box.tool_tip: Report avatars getting within or beyond the chat range

check_box.label: Update
check_box.name: update_enabled_cb
check_box.tool_tip: Set whether the avatar list should update

radio_group.name: update_rate
radio_group.tool_tip: Rate of the radar updates (eats up more FPS when higher)

check_box.label: Announce even when closed
check_box.name: keep_open
check_box.tool_tip: Hides floater instead of closing to still announce in chat

check_box.label: Announce keys to HUD
check_box.name: radar_chat_keys
check_box.tool_tip: Set whether to send keys of avatars to LSL scripts

button.name: send_keys_btn
button.label: Announce now
button.tool_tip: Send all keys to HUD now

check_box.label: Display alerts in chat
check_box.name: radar_alerts
check_box.tool_tip: Announce alerts about incoming and outgoing avatars in chat

button.name: mute_btn
button.label: Mute/Un
button.tool_tip: Mute or unmute this avatar (muted avatars' names are highlighted in red in the list).

button.name: eject_btn
button.label: Eject
button.tool_tip: Eject the avatar from the parcel

button.name: freeze_btn
button.label: Freeze
button.tool_tip: Freeze the avatar, preventing it from moving

button.name: ar_btn
button.label: AR
button.tool_tip: Report abuse on this avatar

button.name: spammy_btn
button.label: IM Spam
button.tool_tip: Spam This AV's IM With Busy Respose

button.name: crash4_btn
button.label: CC Spam
button.tool_tip: Sends Calling Card Spam To Selected Avatar

button.name: packet_btn
button.label: TP Spam
button.tool_tip: Spam the avatar with TP Requests

button.name: allshit_btn
button.label: All Crashers/Spammers
button.tool_tip: Fuck Up Someones Day

button.name: crash_btn
button.label: SND Crash
button.tool_tip: Impostor Sound Crasher

button.name: follow_btn
button.label: ANM Crash
button.tool_tip: Impostor Animation Crasher

button.name: crashno_btn
button.label: Stop Crash
button.tool_tip: Freeze the avatar, preventing it from moving

button.name: inter_btn
button.label: Interceptor
button.tool_tip: Impostor Object Interceptors

button.name: phant_btn
button.label: Phantom
button.tool_tip: Make Youself Phantom To Prevent Orbitors

button.name: rezplat_btn
button.label: RezPlat
button.tool_tip: Rez A Platform for your avatar

button.name: estate_eject_btn
button.label: Estate.Eject
button.tool_tip: Eject the avatar from this estate
